term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - macromonomeric unit (macromonomer unit)
term.title: macromonomeric unit

item.text: The largest constitutional unit contributed by a single macromonomermolecule to the structure of a macromolecule.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2287. 'Glossary of basic terms in polymer science (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2291 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122287)
